_source: speak;Anna;Welcome to the world map!|Here you can organize your items, give units BEXP, buy some items, etc!|Right now there aren't any shops you can go to, but you'll be able to access them once they become available.|You can give BEXP though!|You will get BEXP from beating the chapters, visiting houses/villages, etc.|It will cost more BEXP the higher level the unit is, so spend wisely!|Also to note, trainee units can't use BEXP until they promote to T1 after level 10.|You can get a trainee unit next chapter, so keep note of that!;;;;6
